Class BookData

java.lang.Object
library.data.BookData
public class BookData extends Object
Provides static data for books in the library system.

This class simulates an in-memory database of books and provides methods to add, search, reset, and retrieve book data.

      public static Book getBookByISBN(String isbn)
      Retrieves a book by its ISBN.
      Parameters:
      isbn - the ISBN of the book to search for
      Returns:
      the Book object if found; otherwise null

    • searchBooksByTitle

      public static List<Book> searchBooksByTitle(String title)
      Searches for books by title (case-insensitive).
      Parameters:
      title - the title to search for
      Returns:
      a list of books matching the given title

    • searchBooksByAuthor

      public static List<Book> searchBooksByAuthor(String author)
      Searches for books by author (case-insensitive).
      Parameters:
      author - the author to search for
      Returns:
      a list of books written by the given author

    • resetBooks

      public static void resetBooks()
      Resets all books to be available. Typically used at the start of a new session or test.

    • getAllBooks

      public static List<Book> getAllBooks()
      Returns a copy of all books in the system.
      Returns:
      a list of all Book objects

    • clearBooks

      public static void clearBooks()
      Clears all books from the list. Typically used for testing or resetting the system.
